basics.name: Lokesh Eedara
basics.summary: MS in CS @ EKU (GPA 4.0). AI/LLM + Full-Stack dev: FastAPI, Spring Boot, React, Docker/K8s, AWS/Azure/Render. Built award-winning AI Sales Coach; voice (STT/TTS), RAG, and cloud-native deployments.

projects.name: Big E Sales Coach App
projects.description: Real-time, voice-enabled AI sales role-play platform (Gemini + FastAPI).
highlights: Render deploy + CI/CD; scaled to 60+ users

projects.name: AI Student Advising Chatbot
projects.description: Personalized advising using local LLMs via Ollama + FastAPI.
highlights: Dockerized microservice; 40% reduction in deploy effort
Supported 100+ advising sessions with improved throughput

projects.name: Underwater Image Quality Assessment (UEIQM)
projects.description: No-reference underwater image quality metric using engineered features + SVR.

work.name: Eastern Kentucky University
work.summary: Built LLM apps (Gemini, Ollama), voice pipelines, and cloud prototypes with ~99% uptime; contributed to $5K win.

work.name: Eastern Kentucky University
work.summary: Supported iOS course/labs; automated multi-OS lab setup; configured Cisco gear; mentored 50+ students.

work.name: Slash Mark
work.summary: Spring Boot microservices for HMS; RBAC + HIPAA-minded security; AWS EC2 deploy with Docker.

work.name: BlackBucks
work.summary: React + Spring Boot platform for courses/quizzes; JWT auth; Dockerized on AWS (EC2 + RDS).

awards.title: Winner — EKU Scholars Tank 2025
awards.summary: $5,000 prize for the Big E Sales Coach (AI sales role-play).

awards.title: Graduate Assistantship — EKU
awards.summary: Full-time GA for outstanding academic performance and teaching support.
